title: I ALWAYS GET A BAN AND I NEVER LEFT GAME WITHOUT MY AGREE
body: I PLAY I LOST INTERNET CONNECTION I GET A BAN MY LAUCHER CRASHED AND I GET A BAN NO ELECTRYCY I GET A BAN I NEVER LEFT A GAME BUT I GOT A BAN LIK 300104120414014012041201240 TIMES FUCK THIS GAME AND NOBODY CANT HELP ME

replies.body: It doesn't look like this account is banned at all, but only has an LPQ for about 4 more games. Being marked as AFK for long enough from an internet outage or game crash can place these [**low priority queues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714) if it happens often enough.
That's what the government wants you to think.
